step.para: Installation path: Enter the path to install &abbrev; to. This is useful if you intend to install &abbrev; without registering it as a service, or if it cannot be installed to the default location because of policy compliance reasons. If no path is given, &abbrev; is installed to the default folder.

note.para: When installing &abbrev; to an alternative path on AIX, HP-UX, or Solaris platforms, set the CHARSETALIASDIR environmental variable to the lib subdirectory of the installation path. That way &abbrev; can find the charset.alias file.
